profileText: a Representative from New York; born in Suffern, Rockland County, N.Y., September 9, 1986; graduated from Suffern High School, Suffern, N.Y., 2005; B.A., Manhattan College, New York City, N.Y., 2009; executive director, New York Republican State Committee; staff, Westchester County executive, 2015-2016; deputy supervisor, Orangetown, N.Y., 2018-2020; business owner; member of the New York state assembly, 2020-2023; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-present).
